name: Pencil
description: A traditional wooden pencil for writing and drawing.

name: Ruler
description: A measuring tool used for drawing straight lines or measuring lengths.

name: Markers
description: A set of colorful markers for drawing and highlighting.

name: Compass
description: A very useful tool for when you get lost.

name: Luxury Pen
description: A ballpoint pen made with high end materials.

name: Eraser
description: An eraser that can be used to erase lead pencil or ink pen content.

name: Advanced Compass
description: A new model of the original and popular compass, with magnetic interference resistance, make it more accurate.
